articles.title: Solar storm warning: High-speed winds to smash Earth TOMORROW - exact location pinpointed - Express
articles.description: HIGH-SPEED solar winds are set to batter the Earth's geomagnetic field tomorrow - with the potential for power grid fluctuations, communications interference and aurora expected to be visible over the US states of Maine and Michigan.
